subtopics.subtopic: First Indian astronaut returns to Earth
subtopics.content: • Group Captain Shubhanshu Shukla returned successfully to Earth after his historic journey aboard the ISS as part of Axiom Mission 4, marking a landmark in India’s human spaceflight efforts. :contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0}

subtopics.subtopic: Wins FIDE Women's Chess World Cup
subtopics.content: • Divya Deshmukh emerged as the champion of the FIDE Women’s Chess World Cup held in Batumi, defeating fellow Indian Koneru Humpy—becoming the fourth Indian woman to earn the Grandmaster title. :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}

subtopics.subtopic: First Indian wins Magic Creator Award
subtopics.content: • Magician Suhani Shah became the first Indian recipient of the “Best Magic Creator 2025” award at the FISM (Fédération Internationale des Sociétés Magiques), a prestigious global competition. :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}

• Prime Minister Narendra Modi was conferred with Namibia’s highest civilian honour—the Order of the Most Ancient Welwitschia Mirabilis—during a diplomatic event in July. :contentReference[oaicite:3]{index=3}

• Veteran CPI(M) leader and former Chief Minister of Kerala, V S Achuthanandan, passed away, with public mourning depicted across the state as tributes poured in. :contentReference[oaicite:4]{index=4}

topic: 1. Death of Hulk Hogan – July 2025 Obituaries

subtopics.content: • Terry 'Hulk Hogan' Bollea, legendary WWE star and cultural icon, passed away from cardiac arrest at his home in Clearwater, Florida on July 24, 2025 :contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0}.

topic: 2. Death of Rosie Roche – July 2025 Obituaries

subtopics.content: • Rosie Jeanne Burke Roche, cousin of Princes William and Harry and a student at Durham University, died on July 14, 2025; a firearm was found near her body, but no foul play is suspected :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}.
